mapper.insert:
SELECT seq_activity_seq.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO tf_activity (activity_seq, reg_dtm, update_dtm, status_cd, act_nm, expr_yn, expr_seq, mark_t_cd) VALUES (#{activitySeq}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'N', #{actNm}, #{exprYn}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(expr_seq), 0) + 1 FROM tf_activity), #{markTCd})
mapper.select: SELECT a.activity_seq, a.reg_dtm, a.update_dtm, a.status_cd, a.crop_a_cd, a.act_nm, a.expr_yn, a.expr_seq, a.mark_t_cd, (SELECT x.code_nm FROM tf_code x WHERE x.code_id = 'MARK_T_CD' AND x.code_val = a.mark_t_cd) mark_t_cd_nm FROM tf_activity a WHERE a.status_cd = 'N' AND a.activity_seq = #{activitySeq}

SELECT a.activity_seq, a.reg_dtm, a.update_dtm, a.status_cd, a.crop_a_cd, a.act_nm, a.expr_yn, a.expr_seq, a.mark_t_cd, (SELECT x.code_nm FROM tf_code x WHERE x.code_id = 'MARK_T_CD' AND x.code_val = a.mark_t_cd) mark_t_cd_nm FROM tf_activity a, tf_crop_activity b, tf_crop c WHERE a.activity_seq = b.activity_seq AND b.activity_t_cd = c.activity_t_cd AND a.status_cd = 'N' AND b.status_cd = 'N' AND a.activity_seq = #{activitySeq} AND c.crop_seq = #{cropSeq} ORDER BY a.act_nm
SELECT MAX (a.activity_seq) activity_seq FROM tf_activity a WHERE a.status_cd = 'N' AND LOWER (TRIM (a.act_nm)) = LOWER (TRIM (#{actNm}))

SELECT a.activity_seq, a.reg_dtm, a.update_dtm, a.status_cd, a.crop_a_cd, a.act_nm, a.expr_yn, a.expr_seq, a.mark_t_cd, (SELECT x.code_nm FROM tf_code x WHERE x.code_id = 'MARK_T_CD' AND x.code_val = a.mark_t_cd) mark_t_cd_nm FROM tf_activity a WHERE a.status_cd = 'N'
and a.act_nm LIKE '%' || #{cond.keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY a.reg_dtm DESC, a.expr_seq DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, z.* FROM (SELECT a.activity_seq, a.reg_dtm, a.update_dtm, a.status_cd, a.crop_a_cd, a.act_nm, a.expr_yn, a.expr_seq, a.mark_t_cd, (SELECT x.code_nm FROM tf_code x WHERE x.code_id = 'MARK_T_CD' AND x.code_val = a.mark_t_cd) mark_t_cd_nm FROM tf_activity a WHERE a.status_cd = 'N'
and a.act_nm LIKE '%' || #{cond.keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY a.reg_dtm DESC, a.expr_seq DESC)
WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{start} + #{limit})) WHERE RNUM > #{start}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tf_activity a WHERE a.status_cd = 'N'
and a.act_nm LIKE '%' || #{cond.keyword} || '%'

SELECT a.activity_seq, a.reg_dtm, a.update_dtm, a.status_cd, a.crop_a_cd, a.act_nm, a.expr_yn, a.expr_seq, a.mark_t_cd, (SELECT x.code_nm FROM tf_code x WHERE x.code_id = 'MARK_T_CD' AND x.code_val = a.mark_t_cd) mark_t_cd_nm
FROM tf_activity a, tf_crop_activity b, tf_crop c WHERE a.activity_seq = b.activity_seq AND b.activity_t_cd = c.activity_t_cd AND a.status_cd = 'N' AND b.status_cd = 'N' AND c.crop_seq = #{cropSeq}
FROM tf_activity a WHERE a.status_cd = 'N'
ORDER BY a.activity_seq
ORDER BY a.act_nm

SELECT a.activity_seq, a.reg_dtm, a.update_dtm, a.status_cd, a.crop_a_cd, a.act_nm, a.expr_yn, a.expr_seq, a.mark_t_cd, (SELECT x.code_nm FROM tf_code x WHERE x.code_id = 'MARK_T_CD' AND x.code_val = a.mark_t_cd) mark_t_cd_nm FROM tf_activity a, tf_user_activity b WHERE a.activity_seq = b.activity_seq AND a.status_cd = 'N' AND b.status_cd = 'N' AND b.user_id = #{userId} AND b.crop_seq = #{cropSeq} AND b.user_crop_seq = #{userCropSeq} ORDER BY a.act_nm

SELECT a.activity_seq, a.reg_dtm, a.update_dtm, a.status_cd, a.crop_a_cd, a.act_nm, a.expr_yn, a.expr_seq, b.code_nm crop_a_cd_nm, a.mark_t_cd, (SELECT x.code_nm FROM tf_code x WHERE x.code_id = 'MARK_T_CD' AND x.code_val = a.mark_t_cd) mark_t_cd_nm FROM tf_activity a, tf_code b WHERE a.crop_a_cd = b.code_val AND a.status_cd = 'N' AND b.code_id = 'CROP_A_CD'
AND a.crop_a_cd = #{cropACd}
AND a.crop_a_cd = (SELECT y.crop_a_cd FROM tf_user_crop z, tf_crop y WHERE z.crop_seq = y.crop_seq AND z.user_crop_seq = #{userCropSeq})
ORDER BY a.crop_a_cd, a.expr_seq

SELECT a.activity_seq, a.reg_dtm, a.update_dtm, a.status_cd, a.crop_a_cd, a.act_nm, a.expr_yn, b.expr_seq, a.mark_t_cd, (SELECT x.code_nm FROM tf_code x WHERE x.code_id = 'MARK_T_CD' AND x.code_val = a.mark_t_cd) mark_t_cd_nm FROM tf_activity a, tf_crop_activity b WHERE a.status_cd = 'N' AND b.status_cd = 'N' AND a.activity_seq = b.activity_seq
AND b.activity_t_cd = 1
AND b.activity_t_cd = 2
AND b.activity_t_cd = 3
AND b.activity_t_cd = 4
AND b.activity_t_cd = 5
AND b.activity_t_cd = 6
AND b.activity_t_cd = 0
ORDER BY a.act_nm
mapper.update: UPDATE tf_activity SET update_dtm = SYSDATE, status_cd = 'D' WHERE activity_seq = #{activitySeq}
